function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increasing urban conflicts and violence due to limited resources and inequalities in provision of services.","Impact":"Social, political, and economic instability in urban areas.","Mitigation":"Addressing inequalities and provision of basic services, implementing policies to reduce conflicts.","Technologies":"IoT for predictive analytics and smart city concepts for urban management.","People":"Urban population, urban poor, city residents.","Owner":"Urban management authorities, policymakers, city planners."},{"Description":"Increased risk of violence prompted by forced evictions, land conflicts, and resource scarcity in cities.","Impact":"Danger to safety and security of city residents, potential increase in criminal activities.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to prevent forced evictions, resolving land conflicts, and managing resources effectively.","Technologies":"IoT for monitoring, data analysis for identifying potential conflict areas.","People":"City residents, individuals affected by forced evictions and land conflicts.","Owner":"Local government, urban planning departments."},{"Description":"Environmental degradation and safety concerns from natural disasters like flooding and extreme heat waves.","Impact":"Risk of loss of life, property damage, and disruption to city infrastructure.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures for disaster preparedness, sustainable urban planning, and environmental protection.","Technologies":"IoT for early warning systems, data analysis for identifying vulnerable areas.","People":"City residents, environmental activists, disaster management agencies.","Owner":"City government, environmental protection agencies."}]}
